title: Chests
body: I keep getting S- on my Yasuo but i dont get chest can i get a chest with a champion that is already lv 7 please help!

replies.body: Today I did on Ashe S- but dont give me chests . Its a bug or something else ?

Looking into this for you, I see you've already received a chest for Yasuo.  You can only get a mastery chest once per champion per season.  More details on this can also be found in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  I hope that helps clear things up, and congrats on level 7!
Wait i read that if u get punished u wont get any chest i just got a leaver buster bc my computer messed up does that mean I will never get a chest till season 7??
You can only get one chest on a champion once each season.
